usage.headings: Use Manrope for all section titles and major headings. Keep tracking tight.
usage.body: Use IBM Plex Sans for all paragraphs and UI labels.
usage.numbers: Use JetBrains Mono for all currency, odometer readings, and dates to ensure tabular alignment.

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use #09090b (Zinc 950) as the deepest shade.
Primary action color is a soft Teal (#ccfbf1) to contrast with the dark industrial background.
Use the 'Accent' Yellow (#facc15) sparingly for critical alerts or 'Add Expense' focus.
Borders should be subtle (Zinc 800) but present to define structure.

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

grids.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 p-4 md:p-8
grids.bike_list: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6 p-4 md:p-8

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1) against the dark background.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria_labels: Required for all icon-only buttons (e.g., 'Add Expense', 'Edit Bike').

media.image_style: Desaturated or Black & White with high contrast. Use CSS filter: grayscale(100%) contrast(120%).

3d_libraries.usage: Minimal. Use only for the 'Empty State' or 'Loading' screens if absolutely necessary. Prefer CSS animations.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' dark theme immediately in tailwind.config.js.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the bottom navigation (mobile) and sidebar (desktop).
Use the 'Glassmorphism' style for the Dashboard cards: bg-zinc-950/70 backdrop-blur-xl border-white/10.
Ensure all text inputs have a height of at least 48px (h-12) for touch accessibility.
Use the provided image URLs for the 'Add Bike' placeholder and 'Empty State' screens.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use grids and asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
